text: (tavada) “maṭat vaḍā oba gaurava kaḷa mohuva oba avadhānaya kaḷehida?”yi (ādamva itāmat pahat lesa genahæra dakvamin) “oba māva viniścaya dina dakvā pramāda kara hæriyahot, itāmat suḷutarayak hæra, mohugē paramparāvē daruvan siyallanvama mā mārgaya værada yāmaṭa salasvā (mulin upuṭā) harinnemi” yayi pævasuvēya
